General.Name: Pavilion Real Estate Inv Trust
General.Description: Listed on 7 December 2011, with the largest exposure to the retail sector by any listed Malaysian REIT, Pavilion REIT owns a RM5.9 billion portfolio based on appraised value, to which its most prominent asset is the Pavilion Kuala Lumpur Mall that is located in Bukit Bintang, Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia. Pavilion REIT is established with the principal investment policy of investing, directly and indirectly, in a diversified portfolio of income producing real estate used solely or predominantly for retail purposes (including mixed " use developments with a retail component) in Malaysia and other countries within the Asia-Pacific region.
